nodes.text: Smuggler's Run is a short animated comic based on excerpts of the 2015 junior novel Smuggler's Run: A Han Solo & Chewbacca Adventure. It was created by the multinational food and beverage company Nestlé as part of a licensed Star Wars–themed promotional campaign, along with The Weapon of a Jedi. The two animated comics were originally offered exclusively on the now-defunct Nestlé Comics website by typing a digital code featured on every box of Nestlé cereals.
